mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "PARTNER" WHERE PARTNER_DEL_FL = 'W' AND PARTNER_PASS = 0

SELECT PARTNER_NO, PARTNER_ID, PARTNER_BUSINESS_NAME, PARTNER_BUSINESS_NUM, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') ENROLL_DATE FROM "PARTNER" WHERE PARTNER_DEL_FL = 'W' AND PARTNER_PASS = 0 ORDER BY PARTNER_NO DESC
